GSD.product_version: versions from v3.12 to before v4.19.264
GSD.description:
drm/msm/hdmi: fix memory corruption with too many bridges

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.264 by commit 3c43f3ec731c233eb84b66199ee76dbf3ec6ecae, it was introduced in version v3.12 by commit a3376e3ec81c5dd0622cbc187db76d2824d31c1c. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/msm/hdmi: fix memory corruption with too many bridges
